author: protolambda
content:
Lighthouse v0.3 is now supported with the new eth2stats-client version v0.0.14
Run with arguments like:
```
run  --eth2stats.node-name="test123"   --eth2stats.addr="grpc.zinken.eth2.wtf:8080" --eth2stats.tls=false      --beacon.type="v1" --beacon.addr="http://127.0.0.1:5052"  --beacon.metrics-addr="http://127.0.0.1:5054/metrics"
```

author: protolambda
content: Note that lighthouse peer count does not work yet, it's one of the few not yet unimplemented API endpoints.
